description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The History of Southern & Central Africa: its topography, geography, natural productions, etc. [With illustrations.]", "General Appendix" Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10096.i.1." Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000027783 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
